text: Happy Flight () is a 1949 Soviet comedy movie directed by Vladimir Nemolyayev.Биография Евгения ЛеоноваСчастливый рейс (1949) It stars Nikolay Kryuchkov, Mikhail Zharov, and Vera Orlova. ==Actors== * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Driver Sinichkin * Mikhail Zharov as Driver Zachyosov * Vera Orlova as Fenya * Olga Vikland as Dispatcher Telegina * Vladimir Popov as Garage foreman * Anatoly Gorunov as Alexey Trofimov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1949 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Happy Flight (1949 movie)
